thread.title: Weekend Paris trip - great location and staff
thread.title_full: Weekend Paris trip - great location and staff - Review of Le General Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: DanielleK723
title: Weekend Paris trip - great location and staff
text: I wanted to explore parts of Paris off the beaten path- not the Louvre and Notre Dame, but Belleville and the northeast part of the city- a bit hipper. This hotel was in between two important metro stops to get anywhere. Good restaurants nearby. Three different staff were extremely friendly, going out of their way to help me with various things. I'd stay here again!
